thread.title: Manfred Ebert
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Manfred Ebert

author: Manfred Ebert
title: Manfred Ebert
text: I ordered a Smart Watch which arrives after about 4 weeks. I was impressed with the quality of the secure packaging and the fact that the watch was accompanied by a well written English manual covering all aspects of the watch's use. This is in contrast to some of goods received from other Chinese suppliers which were badly packaged without any instruction on how to use the products.
